listen.title: Listen Anywhere
listen.description: Turn any book into an audiobook with TTS technology.

bookGrid.description: With millions of titles across every genre, there's something for everyone. Discover bestsellers, classics, and hidden gems curated just for you.

featureHighlight.title: Curation you'll love
featureHighlight.description: Discover bestsellers, classics, and hidden gems curated just for you.

ctaSection.title: Get started with Athena Reader today.
ctaSection.description: A reading app is a handy tool for readers who want to keep track of the books they're reading and access curated content from their favorite authors. Athena Reader is an essential companion for book lovers everywhere.

footer.disclaimer: * Family Sharing requires a personal Apple ID signed in to iCloud and iTunes. Music, movies, TV shows, and books can be downloaded on up to 10 devices per account, five of which can be computers.
footer.moreWays: More ways to shop: {{findStore}} or {{otherRetailer}} near you. Or call 1-800-MY-ATHENA.
